title: Should the bonding curve accept ETH for payment?
body: The bonding curve should allow ETH to be used as a payment for GHST, and users should be able to sell their GHST into ETH, instead of being forced to only use DAI. This should increase the overall volume on the platform, and increase overall exposure to GHST.
author: 0x6EDB3471D4e0A90a785d3Fb8ebb81fE32c6C25DF
